casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2007-1865. State v. Aleshire.

Licking App. No. 2007-CA-l, 2007-Ohio-4446. Discretionary appeal accepted on Proposition of Law No. II; cause held for the decision in 2006-1973, State v. Sarkozy, Cuyahoga App. No. 86952, 2006-Ohio-3977; and briefing schedule stayed.

*1506Moyer, C. J., would also accept the appeal on Proposition of Law No. I. Lundberg Stratton and O’Connor, JJ., would also accept the appeal on Proposition of Law Nos. I, III, IV, and V. Pfeifer, O’Donnell, and Cupp, JJ., dissent.
